message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to propose a lower price of $14000 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save some money. I can meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss $16500?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $15000 for the product.
I'm glad we're still in negotiation, Bob. I can see you're serious about getting a good deal. I can do $16000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $15500 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can do $16200, but I really need to make a profit on this sale. Can we meet at $16200?
I'm glad we're making progress, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $15800 for the product.
I think we're really close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $16500?
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the negotiations so far, I would like to propose a final price of $15700 for the product.
